long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Tower defense (TD) is a subgenre of strategy game where the goal is to defend a player's territories or possessions by obstructing the enemy attackers, usually achieved by placing defensive structures on or along their path of attack.

You can upgrade your tower to increase tower damage attack or buy game item using game coin that you get after you complete a level

*note: We have added many external game links, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website!
long.en_AU,en_US,vi:
Tower Defense Game is an engaging and strategic game available as a Chrome extension. In this thrilling game, you must strategically place defensive towers to protect your base from waves of enemy attacks. With a variety of tower types and upgrades, you can customize your defenses and adapt to different enemy strategies. Plan your tower placements carefully, manage resources, and strategically use special abilities to fend off the relentless onslaught. With its immersive graphics, challenging levels, and addictive gameplay, "Tower Defense" offers hours of entertainment. The Chrome extension provides easy access, allowing you to play the game directly in your browser. Plus, it's unblocked and free to play on the monkeymart.org website, ensuring uninterrupted tower defense action. Get ready to defend your base and outsmart your enemies in "Tower Defense Unblocked Game"!

*note: We have added many external game links, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website!
